description: This file defines a Spring configuration class that sets up the OpenAPI metadata for the Wiki to Graph Converter project. It creates and exposes a bean of type OpenAPI with specified title, description, and version.

classes.name: OpenApiConfig
classes.description: A Spring configuration class that provides OpenAPI metadata configuration for the application.

methods.name: customOpenAPI
methods.description: Defines and returns the OpenAPI object configured with API info such as title, description, and version.

calls: .description("Converts wiki content to a graph schema with nodes and relationships")
